text: Spetsyfichni dni (pryznachayut聞sya dlya toho, shchob fasting); yakshcho kozhnyy ye khvore abo mandruyuche, rivne chyslo inshykh dniv mozhe buty zaminene. Tsey khto mozhe shvydko, ale z velykoyu skladnistyu, mozhe zaminyty hoduyuchu odnu bidnu osobu dlya kozhnoho dnya rozryvannya shvydkoho. Yakshcho odyn dobrovolets聞 (bil聞she spravedlyvi pratsi), tse krashche. Ale fasting yavlyaye soboyu krashch dlya vas, yakshcho vy til聞ky znaly
